requirement: The system shall respond to user requests within 2 seconds under normal load conditions.
The system shall maintain 99.9% uptime availability.
All user data shall be encrypted using AES-256 encryption.
The system shall support concurrent access by at least 1000 users.
The user interface shall be accessible according to WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards.
The system shall log all critical operations for audit purposes.
Database queries shall be optimized to execute within 500ms.
The system shall automatically backup data every 24 hours.
User authentication shall use multi-factor authentication (MFA).
The system shall be deployable on cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP).
The system shall support internationalization for at least 5 languages.
Code coverage for unit tests shall be at least 80%.
API endpoints shall handle rate limiting of 100 requests per minute per user.
The system shall scale horizontally to handle 10x traffic spikes.
Error messages shall be user-friendly and provide actionable guidance.
The system shall maintain data consistency across distributed components.
All external API calls shall implement retry logic with exponential backoff.
Sensitive data shall be masked in logs and error messages.
The system shall support dark mode and light mode themes.
Database migrations shall be version-controlled and reversible.
The system shall cache frequently accessed data to improve response times.
The system shall support containerization using Docker.
User sessions shall timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity.
The system shall provide real-time notifications for critical events.
Code shall follow consistent style guidelines and pass linting checks.
The system shall support load balancing across multiple server instances.
API responses shall be paginated for large datasets (max 100 items per page).
The system shall implement circuit breakers for external service calls.
User passwords shall meet complexity requirements (min 12 characters, mixed case, numbers, symbols).
The system shall provide comprehensive API documentation.
